title: MTU Cross Country Earns USTFCCCA All-Academic Honors - michigantechhuskies.com
content: MTU Cross Country Earns USTFCCCA All-Academic Honors  michigantechhuskies.com
description: The United States Track & Field and Cross Country Coaches Association (USTFCCCA) has announced its 2021 Division II All-Academic Teams, and the Michigan Tech cross country teams both earned spots on the men’s and women’s lists. In addition, 10 individual Michigan Tech student-athletes received All-Academic honors.
